March 31, 1979 D Nottingham Championship (Championship Section)
Nottingham Championship (Championship Section) 0 Test Piece Contest Nottingham Championship nottingham-championship-championship-section
Sinfonietta for Brass Band - The Wayfarer
Albert Hall, Nottingham, Nottinghamshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £200 and trophy, 2nd £120 and trophy, 3rd £80 and trophy. 17th annual contest. 7 bands competed.
May 25, 2014, 8:05 a.m. March 29, 2017, 6:40 p.m.
1 Ransome Band Stephen Shimwell
2 Thoresby Colliery William Lippeatt
3 Ibstock Brick Brass P. Hannam
4 Blidworth Welfare Band Allan Street
Unknown Result Calverton Colliery Welfare L. J. Hartill
